TopicTitle: Space Shutle System By DECQ and Kerbal Reuseability Expansion and RSS

Articles.Content:
Hello!

 

So I installed the space shuttle system by DECQ but I have a few problems.  The first problem is real plume and hotrockets is breaking the shuttle's plume.  In other words, there is no flames coming out of the SRB and the space shuttle main engines.  When I installed SSU on what DECQ linked, it wasn't clear on how to put into the KSP folders and neither was SF Photoreal.  Kerbal Reuseability Expansion for some reason.  The space legs bounce so unrealistically.

 

Edited August 12, 2019 by Avation4life
